data.message: This is hell i had conformed for samsung tonner but after 10 days i come to know it is cancalled due to unstock when i booked it,  it was in stock u amazon people dont have courtecy to msg or call when i called u regretted that was totally bulshit and also it was showing me on my app that my tonner is dispatched thats the hell of u amazon guys n today when i called on amazon that time u sended me msg that my product is cancalled to hell with u people service is very poor i really got disappointed.
